text: Geng Jun (; born 1976) is a Chinese independent filmmaker. His films have shown at festivals in China and internationally, such as Youth, which was entered at the 2009 Rome Film Festival, The Hammer and Sickle Are Sleeping (2016 Tromsø International Film Festival), and Free and Easy, which was entered at the 2017 Sundance Film Festival. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:Film directors from Heilongjiang Category:Chinese film directors
title: Geng Jun
